section.title: Interoperation with the GLib test framework
section.para: To minimise the amount of code (and the opportunity for bugs), GTU depends on GLib test APIs for providing certain functionality. However, we also rewrite functionality or hack around GLib's implementation when it isn't sufficiently flexible for our purposes. The end result is that much of GLib's test API cannot be used alongside GTU.
